maml:description.maml:para: Find available extensions on the VSCode Extension Gallery.
Find available extensions with or without Wildcards on the VSCode Extension Gallery. Allows Searching via Tags and Categories.

maml:Description.maml:para: The Extensions Display Name. Accepts WildCards.
Filter Extensions by Categories. Valid categoies are 'Languages', 'Snippets', 'Linters', 'Debuggers', 'Other', 'Themes' and 'Productivity'
Filter Extensions by Publisher Name. Accepts WildCards.
Filter Extensions by Tag names. Accepts WildCards.
The Extensions Name. Accepts WildCards.
Filter Extensions by Categories. Valid categoies are 'Languages', 'Snippets', 'Linters', 'Debuggers', 'Other', 'Themes' and 'Productivity'
Filter Extensions by Publisher Name. Accepts WildCards.
Filter Extensions by Tag names. Accepts WildCards.
The Extensions Display Name. Accepts WildCards.
The Extensions Name. Accepts WildCards.
Filter Extensions by Categories. Valid categoies are 'Languages', 'Snippets', 'Linters', 'Debuggers', 'Other', 'Themes' and 'Productivity'
Filter Extensions by Publisher Name. Accepts WildCards.
Filter Extensions by Tag names. Accepts WildCards.

command:example.maml:title: Example 1

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example uses the Display Name to find the Extension.

command:example.maml:title: Example 2

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example uses the Extension Name to find the Extension.

command:example.maml:title: Example 3

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example uses the Extension Name and Publisher Name to find the Extension.

command:example.maml:title: Example 4

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example finds Extensions with the category Debuggers that start with pow.

command:example.maml:title: Example 5

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example finds Extensions matching the name flow and Tags beginning with Java,

maml:description.maml:para: Get Installed Extensions for Stable or Release Versions of VSCode.

maml:Description.maml:para: Switch to Target Insiders version of Code
Switch to Target Insiders version of Code

command:example.maml:title: Example 1
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Get-VSCodeExtension
FullName : ms-vscode.PowerShell ExtensionName : PowerShell DisplayName : PowerShell Version : 0.6.1 ExtensionPath : C:\Users\i2871rbp\.vscode\extensions\ms-vscode.PowerShell-0.6.1
FullName : ms-vscode.Theme-MaterialKit ExtensionName : Theme-MaterialKit DisplayName : Material Theme Kit Version : 0.1.0 ExtensionPath : C:\Users\i2871rbp\.vscode\extensions\ms-vscode.Theme-MaterialKit
FullName : ms-vscode.Theme-PredawnKit ExtensionName : Theme-PredawnKit DisplayName : Predawn Theme Kit Version : 0.1.0 ExtensionPath : C:\Users\i2871rbp\.vscode\extensions\ms-vscode.Theme-PredawnKit
FullName : ms-vscode.Theme-TomorrowKit ExtensionName : Theme-TomorrowKit DisplayName : Tomorrow and Tomorrow Night Theme Kit Version : 0.1.0 ExtensionPath : C:\Users\i2871rbp\.vscode\extensions\ms-vscode.Theme-TomorrowKit

dev:remarks.maml:para: Outputs the Installed extensions for the Stable Version of VSCode

command:example.maml:title: Example 2
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Get-VSCodeExtension -Insiders
FullName : ms-vscode.PowerShell ExtensionName : PowerShell DisplayName : PowerShell Version : 0.6.1 ExtensionPath : C:\Users\i2871rbp\.vscode-insiders\extensions\ms-vscode.PowerShell-0.6.1
FullName : ms-vscode.Theme-MaterialKit ExtensionName : Theme-MaterialKit DisplayName : Material Theme Kit Version : 0.1.0 ExtensionPath : C:\Users\i2871rbp\.vscode-insiders\extensions\ms-vscode.Theme-MaterialKit
FullName : ms-vscode.Theme-PredawnKit ExtensionName : Theme-PredawnKit DisplayName : Predawn Theme Kit Version : 0.1.0 ExtensionPath : C:\Users\i2871rbp\.vscode-insiders\extensions\ms-vscode.Theme-PredawnKit
FullName : ms-vscode.Theme-TomorrowKit ExtensionName : Theme-TomorrowKit DisplayName : Tomorrow and Tomorrow Night Theme Kit Version : 0.1.0 ExtensionPath : C:\Users\i2871rbp\.vscode-insiders\extensions\ms-vscode.Theme-TomorrowKit

dev:remarks.maml:para: Outputs the Installed extensions for the Insiders Version of VSCode

maml:description.maml:para: Gets statistics for a VSCode Extension.
Gets statistics for a VSCode Extension or multiple extensions using a wildcard.

maml:Description.maml:para: The Extensions Display Name of the Extension. Accepts WildCards.
Filter Extensions by Categories. Valid categoies are 'Languages', 'Snippets', 'Linters', 'Debuggers', 'Other', 'Themes' and 'Productivity'
Filter Extensions by Publisher Name. Accepts WildCards.
Filter Extensions by Tag names. Accepts WildCards.
The Extensions Name of the Extension. Accepts WildCards.
Filter Extensions by Categories. Valid categoies are 'Languages', 'Snippets', 'Linters', 'Debuggers', 'Other', 'Themes' and 'Productivity'
Filter Extensions by Publisher Name. Accepts WildCards.
Filter Extensions by Tag names. Accepts WildCards.
The Extensions Display Name of the Extension. Accepts WildCards.
The Extensions Name of the Extension. Accepts WildCards.
Filter Extensions by Categories. Valid categoies are 'Languages', 'Snippets', 'Linters', 'Debuggers', 'Other', 'Themes' and 'Productivity'
Filter Extensions by Publisher Name. Accepts WildCards.
Filter Extensions by Tag names. Accepts WildCards.

command:example.maml:title: Example 1
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Get-VSCodeExtensionStats -DisplayName 'Flatland Monokai Theme'
Extension Name : Flatland Monokai Theme Publisher Name : gerane Install Count : 8548 Average Rating : 5 Rating Count : 4 Trending Daily : 7.48747055944117 Trending Weekly : 37.234988728031766 Trending Monthly : 183.44302870630867

dev:remarks.maml:para: Gets stats for the Flatland Monokai Theme using Display Name

command:example.maml:title: Example 2
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Get-VSCodeExtensionStats -ExtensionName 'Theme-FlatlandMonokai'
Extension Name : Flatland Monokai Theme Publisher Name : gerane Install Count : 8548 Average Rating : 5 Rating Count : 4 Trending Daily : 7.48747055944117 Trending Weekly : 37.234988728031766 Trending Monthly : 183.44302870630867

dev:remarks.maml:para: Gets stats for the Flatland Monokai Theme using Extension Name

command:example.maml:title: Example 3
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Get-VSCodeExtensionStats -ExtensionName 'Theme-FlatlandMonokai' -PublisherName 'gerane'
Extension Name : Flatland Monokai Theme Publisher Name : gerane Install Count : 8548 Average Rating : 5 Rating Count : 4 Trending Daily : 7.48747055944117 Trending Weekly : 37.234988728031766 Trending Monthly : 183.44302870630867

dev:remarks.maml:para: Gets stats for the Flatland Monokai Theme using Extension Name and Publisher Name

command:example.maml:title: Example 4
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Get-VSCodeExtensionStats -ExtensionName '*Flatland*'
Extension Name : Flatland Monokai Theme Publisher Name : gerane Install Count : 8548 Average Rating : 5 Rating Count : 4 Trending Daily : 7.48747055944117 Trending Weekly : 37.234988728031766 Trending Monthly : 183.44302870630867
Extension Name : Flatland_Dark Theme Publisher Name : gerane Install Count : 982 Average Rating : Rating Count : Trending Daily : 1.7649484774501054 Trending Weekly : 6.287628950916 Trending Monthly : 19.41443325195116
Extension Name : Flatland_Black Theme Publisher Name : gerane Install Count : 546 Average Rating : Rating Count : Trending Daily : 2.1339517893452813 Trending Weekly : 3.912244947133016 Trending Monthly : 8.891465788938671

dev:remarks.maml:para: Gets stats for all Extension Names containing Flatland using WildCards.

maml:description.maml:para: Get VSCode Gallery statistics for a Publisher.

maml:Description.maml:para: The Publisher Name. Accepts WildCards.
The Publisher Name. Accepts WildCards.

command:example.maml:title: Example 1
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Get-VSCodePublisherStats -PublisherName 'gerane'
Publisher Name : gerane Publisher ID : a5c25faf-bf60-4941-81b9-9a852b96c5fb Total Extension Installs : 98994 Extension Count : 287 Most Downloaded Extension : Flatland Monokai Theme Most Downloaded Count : 8548

dev:remarks.maml:para: Gets the statistics for the provided publisher.

maml:description.maml:para: Installs a VSCode Extension for either Stable or Insiders versions.

maml:Description.maml:para: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet. Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
The Extensions Display Name to be Installed. Accepts WildCards.
Switch to Target Insiders version of Code
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Filter Extensions by Categories. Valid categoies are 'Languages', 'Snippets', 'Linters', 'Debuggers', 'Other', 'Themes' and 'Productivity'
Filter Extensions by Publisher Name. Accepts WildCards.
Filter Extensions by Tag names. Accepts WildCards.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet. Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
The Extensions Name to be Installed. Accepts WildCards.
Switch to Target Insiders version of Code
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Filter Extensions by Categories. Valid categoies are 'Languages', 'Snippets', 'Linters', 'Debuggers', 'Other', 'Themes' and 'Productivity'
Filter Extensions by Publisher Name. Accepts WildCards.
Filter Extensions by Tag names. Accepts WildCards.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet. Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
The Extensions Display Name to be Installed. Accepts WildCards.
The Extensions Name to be Installed. Accepts WildCards.
Switch to Target Insiders version of Code
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Filter Extensions by Categories. Valid categoies are 'Languages', 'Snippets', 'Linters', 'Debuggers', 'Other', 'Themes' and 'Productivity'
Filter Extensions by Publisher Name. Accepts WildCards.
Filter Extensions by Tag names. Accepts WildCards.

command:example.maml:title: Example 1
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Install-VSCodeExtension -DisplayName 'Flatland Monokai Theme'

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example uses the Display Name to Install the Extension.

command:example.maml:title: Example 2
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Install-VSCodeExtension -ExtensionName 'Theme-FlatlandMonokai' -Insiders

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example uses the Extension Name to Install the Extension. It is being installed for the Insiders version of VSCode.

command:example.maml:title: Example 3
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Install-VSCodeExtension -ExtensionName 'Theme-FlatlandMonokai' -PublisherName 'gerane'

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example uses the Extension Name and Publisher Name to Install the Extension.

command:example.maml:title: Example 4
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Install-VSCodeExtension -ExtensionName 'pow*' -Category Debuggers

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example Installs the PowerShell Extension by searching for Extensions with category Debuggers and start with pow.

command:example.maml:title: Example 5
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Find-VSCodeExtension -ExtensionName '*flow*' -Tag Java*

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example Installs the flow-for-vscode and vscode-flow Extensions by searching for Extensions with tags starting with Java and names containing flow.

maml:description.maml:para: Uninstalls Extensions for Stable or Insiders Versions of VSCode using names or Wildcards.

maml:Description.maml:para: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet. Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
The Extensions Display Name. Accepts WildCards.
Switch to Target Insiders version of Code
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Filter Extensions by Publisher Name. Accepts WildCards.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet. Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
The Extensions Name. Accepts WildCards.
Switch to Target Insiders version of Code
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Filter Extensions by Publisher Name. Accepts WildCards.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet. Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
The Extensions Display Name. Accepts WildCards.
The Extensions Name. Accepts WildCards.
Switch to Target Insiders version of Code
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Filter Extensions by Publisher Name. Accepts WildCards.

command:example.maml:title: Example 1
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Uninstall-VSCodeExtension -DisplayName 'Flatland Monokai Theme'

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example uses the Display Name to Uninstall the Extension.

command:example.maml:title: Example 2
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Uninstall-VSCodeExtension -ExtensionName 'Theme-FlatlandMonokai' -Insiders

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example uses the Extension Name to Uninstall the Extension. It is being uninstalled for the Insiders version of VSCode.

command:example.maml:title: Example 3
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Uninstall-VSCodeExtension -ExtensionName 'Theme-FlatlandMonokai' -PublisherName 'gerane'

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example uses the Extension Name and Publisher Name to Uninstall the Extension.

command:example.maml:title: Example 4
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Uninstall-VSCodeExtension -ExtensionName '*' -PublisherName 'gerane'

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example Uninstalls all Extensions by the Publisher gerane

maml:description.maml:para: Finds outdated Extensions for Stable or Insiders versions of VSCode and Updates them.

maml:Description.maml:para: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet. Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
Switch to Target Insiders version of Code
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Passes updated extensions as output.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet. Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
Switch to Target Insiders version of Code
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Passes updated extensions as output.

command:example.maml:title: Example 1
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Update-VSCodeExtension -Passthru
Name Version ---- ------- gerane.Theme-CarbonightBlue 0.0.2 gerane.Theme-Zenburn 0.0.3 ms-vscode.Theme-PredawnKit 0.1.1 ms-vscode.Theme-TomorrowKit 0.1.3

dev:remarks.maml:para: Updates Extensions for the Stable Version of VSCode.

command:example.maml:title: Example 2
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Update-VSCodeExtension -Insiders

dev:remarks.maml:para: Updates Extensions for the Insiders Version of VSCode.
